name: Sumireko's Snowboarding School
description:
Nostalgic for the winter games of home, Usami Sumireko climbs up the Tengu Mountain and conjures up a snowboard with which to ride. As she does, two of Gensokyo's more colorful citizens find her atop the peak, turning a personal moment into a fun activity to share.

Join in on the fun as you dodge trees, evade rocks, and pull sick jumps to the beat of Touhou-inspired drum-n-bass to get to the bottom first! With different endings for all three characters and several original tracks to listen to, we hope you will have fun judging this entry for Touhou Project Jam 10!

[This game has multi-language support, offering Spanish and Portuguese translations. You can choose between all three languages at the starting menu.]

CREDITS

  • Concept, Scenario and Direction: mitaka78 and junejijo
  • Programming: mitaka78, Aeon, Akira
  • Character and Background Art: Mollyyncy
  • Music Composition: Doody
  • Chart Mapping: Aeon, Mollyyncy, KinggTut
  • Writing: junejijo
  • Portuguese Translation: Doody
  • Spanish Translation: junejijo (with DeepL Translate assistance)

OUTSIDE ASSET CREDITS

  • Breeze, by Lanea Zimmerman, under CC-4.0
  • CountrysideWinterEvening02.WAV, by pcaeldries, under CC-4.0
  • Footsteps_Snow_04.WAV by MarcMatthewsMusic, under CC-0
  • Camera_Shutter_Mechanical_4s.MP3 by F-idem, under CC-0

ORIGINAL MUSIC CREDITS

All music is originally created by Doody

  • Menu Theme: "Protection from the Cold", original composition with inspiration from Mountain of Faith's "Sealed Gods" and Perfect Cherry Blossom's "Crystallized Silver"
  • Sumireko's Theme: "Occult Japan Grab", original composition with inspiration from Urban Legend in Limbo's "Last Occultism"
  • Mokou's Theme: "Lunar Nosegrab", original composition with inspiration from Imperishable Night's "Reach for the Moon ~ Immortal Smoke"
  • Aya's Theme: "Crow Tailslide", original composition with inspiration from Mountain of Faith's "The Youkai Mountain ~ Mysterious Blossom" and Phantasmagoria of Flower View's "Wind God Girl"

This is a Touhou Project Fangame. This game is not affiliated with or endorsed by ZUN or Team Shanghai Alice.

A BakaBaku Production.
